Articles.Content:
Post your KonSPiracies!

Try to be funny/pointed, don't take the 7!$$ and don't take it too seriously either! Oh, and no repeats please (so far as possible)!


I heard a rumour that Squad has entered sponsorship negotiations with Tic-Tac and ORANGE Kerbs are on the way!
I heard they were going to make the orange tanks actually orange-flavored

I heard the Magic Boulder was Pol in disguise!

Edited June 28, 2016 by Findthepin1
I heard that SQUAD is removing all 3.75 m parts after NASA cancelled the ARM.
I heard a rumor that there were rumors.
I heard a rumor that someone started a forum game where you post rumors you heard. I also heard a rumor that I posted in it.
I heard a rumor Squad is selling KSP to Apple. It was also rumoured apple would now sell KSP in aluminium boxes.

I heard a rumor that KSP is just a kid playing in a sandbox while eating Rockomax Jumbo 64 tic-tacs with an orange flavored mystery goo inside of them....

 

Edited July 8, 2016 by AlmostNASA
I heard a rumor that SQUAD is being sold to Diep.io which is being sold to Miniclip which is being sold to EA which is being sold to Elon Musk.
I heard a rumor that Juno is now orbiting Alaska.
I heard a rumor that Alaska is orbiting a GBH.

I heard a rumor that KSP was actually a mind control program started by the US government to make all of us into brilliant rocket scientists for an massive conquest of space

Edited July 16, 2016 by qzgy
Estados Unidos de Mexico or the United States of America? Conspiracy?
I Heard that thomas the dank engine was going to be a new rocket engine in the next update.
I heard a rumour that Cassini is not crashing into Saturn, the government is actually going to use it to seed life on Titan.
Already done via hygens probe.
i heard a rumor, gonna be fun they said
I heard a rumor, SQAUD is secretly owned by EA...
I heard a rumor...that KSP on console doesn't actually exist.
I heard a rumor that KSP is going to introduce a new race of penguins in the south pole. Exclusively for Linux users
I heard a rumor that on a secret planet slightly past Eeloo, supposedly named Earth, a bigger version of the map from The Crew can be found.

I heard a rumor that the President  is a Kerbal in disguise!

Edited August 15, 2016 by OrbitalBuzzsaw
I heard a rumor that those shiny dots in the sky are actually giant balls of fire. Crazy, right? There's no way that could be true.
I heard a rumor you got a tumor that as a consumer it's keeping you in ill humor.
I heard that all those restrictive warranties on all the sensors aren't actually voidable. They are just like that to stop Kerbals from exploring too much of the Kerbol system.
